metadata.title: CVE-2018-6406 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The function ParseVP9SuperFrameIndex in common/libwebm_util.cc in libwebmthrough 2018-01-30 does not validate the child_frame_length data obtainedfrom a .webm file, which allows remote attackers to cause an informationleak or a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and laterout-of-bounds write), or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'Ubuntu touch end-of-life').
